story_parts.text: Joe the giraffe went on a hike. He saw many different animals along the way. He saw a squirrel, a rabbit, and a deer. He also saw a bird and a fish. He was so excited to see all of these different animals.

next_options.0: Joe the Giraffe saw a lion on his hike
next_options.1: Joe the Giraffe saw a mouse on his hike
